name: Mimic Maya ~ Heartful Recital
description:
Story

An army of rabbits invaded the island where Maya resides.

With Marilyn's help, Maya intends to find out what they are doing there.

Playable Characters

-Maya, a Pink Haired Girl who's always happy and love Choco-pistachio. She can Mimic other elements.

-Base Element; Light

-Special; Absorb. She can steal enemy bullets to charge her energy.

-Bomb; Pink Starstorm. Stars fall everywhere.

-Marilyn (Second Player Only), the Dragon Priestess who doesn't wants to do her job.

-Element ; Fire

-Special ; Firewall. A wall that block enemies attacks.

-Bomb ; Legendary Fire. A big Fire blast.

After finishing the Story Mode you unlock the Extra Stage.

After finishing the Extra Stage you unlock Encore Mode, a harder version of the Story Mode and Extra Stage.

Controls

W / Z ; Shoot

X ; Special

C ; Bomb

Q ; Dodge

S ; Partner' Special

D ; Partner's Bomb

Left Shift ; Lock Direction

Left Ctrl ; Lock Mouvement
